tweets.text:
Apply for a paid #traineeship at the EU Agency @BERECeuropaeu in Riga and you could work in:

▪️Policies and administration
▪️Communication
▪️Programme Management
▪️Human Resources
▪️ICT and Logistics
▪️Legal and procurement

Apply @ https://t.co/lH2CThdIHf
#EUJobs https://t.co/fFq5Xqr8BK

The transition from copper to fibre is a once in a lifetime change in technology. The tools given to regulators are pretty much the same tools we had before; perhaps we need new tools, ponders @BERECeuropaeu’s Jeremy Godfrey. #FTTH19

Demand for fibre is as important as supply. @BERECeuropaeu is examining what policy makers & regulators can do to accelerate the cycle of investment feeding demand & demand feeding investment, highlights Chairman Jeremy Godfrey #FTTH19 https://t.co/VH0ko0xhJF
Tomorrow you can find out what happened last week in @BERECeuropaeu Plenary meeting. #EECC https://t.co/vgqtnpO9Ds

Are you a policy geek or nonexpert? Either way this session is for you! Let @jgodfreyie, @BERECeuropaeu Chairman 2019 guide you through the Post-Code discussion.  What are the new Policy Priorities for the Next EU Institutions? https://t.co/FCoOeIAcCK #FTTH19 https://t.co/zP4U66RhtO

Are you a young graduate looking for a #traineeship in #HumanResources? Apply at the following #EU Agencies:

▪️@EU_OSHA in Spain → https://t.co/cX4XqKPYGa
▪️@BERECeuropaeu in Latvia → https://t.co/VWrCCVqCI9
▪️@enisa_eu in Greece → https://t.co/TRJaF36XLk

#EUJobs #HRM #HR https://t.co/JxVwVfg0tF

.@jgodfreyie, @BERECeuropaeu Chair, highlights the challenges of harmonisation & argues that the role of national enforcement is still relevant in a #DigitalSingleMarket, during the 6th annual GSMA-EIF High Level Roundtable Debate. #MWC19 
➡️https://t.co/HwybKzAAxN

.@BERECeuropaeu Chair @jgodfreyie concluding a lively morning of debate around the new #EECC and its implementation
#Telecom #Digital #Internet #Europe
Find out what's next @CERRE_ThinkTank -> https://t.co/rkG81h49Lv https://t.co/qtgxexChIi
.@BERECeuropaeu #tenders #Interim_Workers Services for the #BEREC Office - 25.1.19 - https://t.co/W4pcpqNM9w https://t.co/6oY069Ha9K
.@BERECeuropaeu concludes that the European #NetNeutrality Regulation is working according to its intention to protect end-users’ rights and internet innovation. #BERECpublic
Dan Sjöblom, General Director of @PTSse, is the new #BERECchair 2020 👏👏🏼👏🏾 https://t.co/mOewbXm5Ts

The next step is to ensure staff and budget for BEREC Office so that it can provide full support to @BERECeuropaeu I call on @EU2018AT and @EU_Commission to back the EP proposals on 2019 EU budget in this regard @PaulRuebig @krisjaniskarins @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @ViolaRoberto

Eiropas Parlamentā nupat nobalsojām par jauniem pienākumiem ES Elektronisko sakaru iestādei @BERECeuropaeu, lai veicinātu konkurenci telekomunikāciju tirgū un uzraudzību pār to,stiprinātu iestādes ekspertīzi un cilvēkresursus. Šī ir vienīgā ES līmeņa aģentūra, kas atrodas Latvijā
.@BERECeuropaeu #tenders Development of a #System_Dynamics_Model about the Determinants of Investment in very #High_Capacity_Networks (VHCN) - 5.11.18 https://t.co/Jluija9GHD https://t.co/us5J0yUjpY

ComReg Commissioner Jeremy Godfrey discussing the @BERECeuropaeu Work Programme 2019 #BERECforum https://t.co/ReHRfLbLca

Tune in to the #BERECforum via https://t.co/uRnwFRRVMj. Ongoing: Panel I to @BERECeuropaeu Effectiveness & Stakeholder Engagement. https://t.co/4gPIyLwtvZ
"Long term planning in the new @BERECeuropaeu Work Programme 2019 will give the Stakeholders more time to respond to public consultations," says Vice Chair Jeremy Godfrey from @comreg. #BERECforum

@BERECeuropaeu Chair Johannes Gungl kicks off the #BEREC Stakeholder Forum 2018: "We want to listen, we want to get better, we want to intensify the dialogue." #BERECforum https://t.co/suF4rmAHBF
